oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pathogenic Yersinia and Listeria monocytogenes in organic pork production
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Laukkanen, R.
Ortiz, P.
Hellström, S.
Siekkinen, K.-M.
Ranta, J.
Nuotio, L.
Maijala, R.
Korkeala, H.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Health and welfare
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The goal of this study is to determine the prevalence of pathogenic Yersinia and Listeria monocytogenes in organic pork production and assess risks in different steps of the pork production chain.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Laukkanen, R.; Ortiz, P.; Hellström, S.; Siekkinen, K.-M.; Ranta, J.; Nuotio, L.; Maijala, R. and Korkeala, H. (2005) Pathogenic Yersinia and Listeria monocytogenes in organic pork production. In: NJF Report, Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists, 1 (1), pp. 43-46.
